resources.string: Tap the button to start recording
Unable to detect an internet connection. Please turn it on in your network settings.
You are not helpless. You will find your way.
A 20 second voice sample will be recorded once you click the button
Seems like something has blown up with our code. You viewing this does not fix this. But do not worry, Top men are now aware
Seems like the voice belongs to me!
Did I get it right? Tap the button if wrong
